gaza.title: Please help 🍉
description: This is not a political or religious question.
This is a human rights one.
Acting against a genocide happening live before our eyes at Gaza doesn't make us antisemitic or pro-hamas.
If you can't afford giving money, please share the following link with your viewers, it's as important 💖
gaza.araborg_head: Just click a button every day
gaza.araborg_message: 💖🍉 1 free click per day to help =>
gaza.gazafunds_head: Donate to a randomly selected campaign
